entry.title: Thoughts on fee bumping
entry.summary: According to a tweet by a user named @0xB10C, there is a possibility that some mining pools use bitcoind with custom patches. The tweet mentions the example of f2pool which uses a fork of bitcoind with custom patches. The user requests anyone with an indication of such miners running forks of bitcoind to inform them. The message ends with the signature of the user, Prayank, and their public key.
